title: Crayola Model Magic, Modeling Clay Alternative, 15 Assorted Colors, 1 oz Packs, 30 Count & Model Magic, Deluxe Craft Pack, Gift, 14 Single Packs, at Home Crafts for Kids
features: Product 1: CRAYOLA MODEL MAGIC VARIETY PACK: This Model Magic modeling clay alternative includes 30 1 oz bags in 15 fun colors (2 of each color) and an Idea Guide with tips & project ideas!

Product 1: REUSABLE MODELING CLAY ALTERNATIVE: Each pack of Model Magic modeling material is a blank canvas waiting for young sculptors to unleash their talents and skills; This clay alternative can easily be used over and over again.
Product 1: SCHOOL SUPPLIES: Modeling Magic comes in 1 oz sealed pouches making it the perfect model clay alternative to pass out at school or at home.
Product 1: SIMPLE CRAFTS FOR KIDS: Model Magic can be used again and again or left to air dry so creations harden and stay intact; Young crafters will have endless hours of fun.
Product 2: BULK MODEL MAGIC SET: includes 10 Project cards, 14 0.5 oz Bags; 7oz model Magic in white; blue; yellow, green; red; black; orange; purple; & brown.
Product 2: SIMPLE ARTS AND CRAFTS: get kids inspired to create every day with easy-to-use Modeling material.

Product 2: SAVE OR REUSE: you can save your creations by letting them air dry; Or reuse model Magic anytime when you store it in an airtight container; Single packs make it easy to save unused Modeling material.
Product 2: MODELING CLAY ALTERNATIVE: this simple Modeling material dries Lightweight and is best for beginner sculptors.
description: Crayola Model Magic, Modeling Clay Alternative, 15 Assorted Colors, 1 oz Packs, 30 CountThe Crayola Model Magic Variety Pack includes the most colors of Model Magic ever assembled in one pack! Each of the 30 individually wrapped packs of Model Magic comes in 1-oz sealed pouches, making it the perfect clay-like modeling material to pass out at school or at home. Soft and squishy, Model Magic is easy for young sculptors to manipulate, making it an excellent alternative to modeling clay. Model Magic can be used again and again if kept in a resealable plastic bag or kids can make their creations permanent by letting them air dry overnight. Includes 30 1-oz bags in 15 fun colors (2 of each color). Safe and nontoxic, this giant set is ideal for kids ages 3 and up!Crayola Model Magic, Deluxe Craft Pack, Gift, 14 Single Packs, At Home Crafts for KidsAspiring sculptors will appreciate the lightweight, spongy modeling material that sticks to itself but not to your hands. Crayola Model Magic is a unique, lightweight modeling clay alternative perfect for any age. This deluxe variety pack of modeling material comes in 9 different colors for you to blend, shape, paint, and decorate. Model Magic air dries, usually within 24 hours. And this pack comes with all the hues you need including 14 single packs of white, red, blue, green, and yellow and 1 each of black, brown, purple, and orange. Grow your art supplies collection by adding Crayola Model Magic to blend, shape, and decorate at home or in the classroom. Itâ€™s so much fun for everyone!
